text: Cheikh Ahmet Tidian Niasse (born 19 January 2000) is a Senegalese professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for the French club Lille. ==Professional career== On 24 January 2019, Niasse signed a professional contract with Lille OSC for 3 years. Niasse made his professional debut for Lille in a 3-0 Ligue 1 win over AS Saint-Étienne on 28 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * FFF Profile * FDB Profile Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:People from Fatick Region Category:Association football midfielders Category:Senegalese footballers Category:Lille OSC players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:Championnat National 2 players Category:Senegalese expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Cheikh Niasse
